alert.note: Alert for Dunn; Mercer; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued March 11 at 3:03PM CST until March 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT CST /11 PM MST/ TONIGHT TO 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing now expected. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Dunn, Mercer, and Oliver Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, until midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from midnight CST /11 PM MST/ tonight to 10 AM CDT /9 AM MDT/ Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
